name: PUBG CAFE
description:
Single player prototype level. 

Interactive virtual restaurant themed around PUBG. Enjoy a hot cup of joe in the internet café, or head up stairs for a nice dinner with great atmosphere. There are a couple surprises too, if you know where to look!

Logo and co-design by Frankie Cerio. Design and development by Grant Ervin.

Created during the Fall 2020 NA PUBG Studios Hackathon, PUBG is a copyright of KRAFTON and PUBG CORP.
